first_section_text_1: Hello there! welcome to my little space in the web, here I showcase my works, experiments and projects related to web development.
first_section_text_2: I am a frontend engineer based in Medellín, Colombia, driven by a constant passion for creation and improvement. I am enthusiastic about technology and always eager to embrace new challenges and opportunities to learn and grow.
second_section_text_1: I have expertise in web application development with React, NextJS and TypeScript.
second_section_text_2: My goal is always to try to unite in harmony a logical and efficient solution with a unique artistic touch. Let’s achieve this!
